Description: go to the kitchen, turn on the coffee machine and let it cook then fetch with a cup.
collect all the dirty plate and bowls into a sink, get a dish sponge, apply the dish soap and wash off the dirt and arrange on the dish rack
pick out an apple, get a knife and slice the apple.
take the bread and insert it in the toaster, turn the toaster on and let the bread toast and remove it.

take a frying pan and put it on the stove, turn on the stove knob. get the eggs and break and beat using a fork, pour the egg into the pan and let it cook, turn using a spatula, let the other side cook and serve into a plate
take the tomatoes in a bowl. slice them using a knife. put the pot on the stove, turn the stove on and add the tomatoes, add salt and bring to boil. add potatoes if need be.
slice lettuce with a knife, put a pot on the stove and turn the stove on, add some oil and add the sliced lettuce add salt and pepper to taste.
turn on the stove nob, put the pot on the stove, add a cup of water and bring to boil.
check the eggs and find one that is cracked, throw it in the bin
open the fridge and check the fridge, clear all items.
First find the potato. Find a knife.Use knife to slice potato.Put potato slices on plate. Put plate in microwave and turn on.
Find cup, pick up wine, open wine, tilt over cup and pour wine.
Pick up food put in bowl. Open fridge put food in fridge close fridge.
Find cup, pick up cup. Turn on cold water faucet on sink,put cup under water until full.
Find pot, fill with water, put pot on stove, turn on stove. Find potato, put in pot.Leave on stove until water boils and potato is cooked.
Find unused apple slices, put in bin.
Find all kitchen utensils,open drawer,put all kitchen utensils in drawer,close drawer.

Task: Pour away coffee in a cup_17_4
Description: Find the cup and bring it to the sink to pour it.
Pick up pot, walk to the sink, tilt pot over sink and pour water from pot into sink.
Locate kitchen light on the wall .Flick the switch down to turn off light.
FIRSTLT OPEN THE LAPTOP SWITCH ON IT AND MAKE SURE IT HAVE PACKUP POWER
GO NEAR THE TV AND PUT ON THE ON SWITCH

Task: Check the timing on the watch_205_4
Description: Find the watch in the room and check the time.
PICK UP THE BOX ,TAKE THE LAPTOP ON THE TABLE TO PUT IN THE BOX AND ALSO TISSUE BOX,PILLOW,CANDLE PUT IN IT
MAINLY CHECK THE CONDITION OF THE TISSUEBOX IF EMPTY PUT IT IN THE BIN

Task: Turn off the table lamp or desk lamp_211_4
Description: Find the lamp. Reach under the shade. Turn the knob clockwise until it turns off.
Find your hand phone. Go to the table. Turn the screen towards the table. Smash the screen on the edge of the table.
Find your hand phone. Pick up the hand phone and on it.
Go to the sofa. Pick up random items including laptop and pillows from the sofa. Put those items on the table.
Locate book in room. Pick up book. Walk to sofa. Sit on sofa and open book.
